ownerId.description: A foreign key to the ID of the 'principal' object for the user.

uri.description: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) for this entity.

etag.description: Synapse employs an Optimistic Concurrency Control (OCC) scheme to handle concurrent updates. Since the E-Tag changes every time an entity is updated it is used to detect when a client's current representation of an entity is out-of-date.

userName.title: User Name
userName.description: User Name, unique in the system and typically the user's email address

displayName.title: Display Name
displayName.description: Display Name, typically the first name followed by the last name

rStudioUrl.title: RStudio URL
rStudioUrl.description: URL for RStudio server assigned to the user
